perturbation.original_text: Oxbow and Global each may be referred to from time to time herein as a "Party" and collectively as the "Parties".
perturbation.changed_text: Oxbow and Global each may be referred to from time to time herein as a "Party" and collectively as the "Entities".
perturbation.explanation: The term 'Parties' is defined as the collective reference to Oxbow and Global. Changing this to 'Entities' without redefining creates confusion. Later sections may refer to 'Parties,' leading to ambiguity about whether 'Entities' is also included.

perturbation.original_text: (i) Default. Material nonperformance by the other Party of any provisions set forth in this Agreement which is not cured within thirty (30) days after receipt of notice thereof from the Party not in default; or
perturbation.changed_text: (i) Default. Material nonperformance by the other Company of any provisions set forth in this Agreement which is not cured within thirty (30) days after receipt of notice thereof from the Party not in default; or
perturbation.explanation: In the original text, 'Party' is used consistently. Replacing 'Party' with 'Company' in one instance introduces inconsistency and ambiguity. It is unclear whether 'Company' refers to Global Energy, Oxbow, or another entity, affecting the default clause's enforceability.

perturbation.original_text: Confidential Information shall not be used for any purpose other than to evaluate and consummate the transactions contemplated by this Agreement, and shall not be disclosed without prior written consent of the other Party, except to: (i) those employees with a need to know the Confidential Information for the purpose of performing work related to the transactions contemplated by this Agreement; provided, however that the Parties shall require all such employees receiving the Confidential Information abide by the terms of this confidentiality covenant.
perturbation.changed_text: Confidential Information shall not be used for any purpose other than to evaluate and consummate the transactions contemplated by this Agreement, and shall not be disclosed without prior written consent of the other Participant, except to: (i) those employees with a need to know the Confidential Information for the purpose of performing work related to the transactions contemplated by this Agreement; provided, however that the Parties shall require all such employees receiving the Confidential Information abide by the terms of this confidentiality covenant.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Party' to 'Participant' creates uncertainty. The original text makes the restriction explicit to the parties to the agreement. Now it is unclear if 'Participant' is the same as defined 'Party', creating confusion.
